TheEllenShow / Via youtube.com He went on to say, “Listen, whoever you are — as long as you’re living and breathing, you have to think, a woman’s body brought you into this world.”
ID: 10274357 5. Ellen shifted the conversation to Kim Burrell and her recent anti-gay sermon that went viral. View this image ›
TheEllenShow / Via youtube.com ID: 10275333 6. Ellen acknowledged that Burrell was originally slated to perform with Pharrell, but that ultimately it didn’t feel right to have her on the show. View this image ›
TheEllenShow / Via youtube.com Ellen then gave Pharrell the opportunity to comment.
ID: 10275335 7. Pharrell, who has publicly condemned his collaborator’s rhetoric on social media, had a lot to say. View this image ›
TheEllenShow / Via youtube.com Pharrell added, “She’s a fantastic singer, and I love her — just like I love everybody else.”
